name: Push-ups
description: Classic bodyweight chest and triceps exercise. Keep core tight and lower until chest nearly touches floor.

name: Goblet Squat
description: Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest. Squat down keeping knees over toes, drive up through heels.

name: Dumbbell Row
description: Bend at waist, support on bench or knee. Pull dumbbell to hip, squeeze shoulder blade.

name: Plank
description: Hold a straight line from head to heels on forearms and toes. Engage core and glutes.

name: Lunges
description: Step forward, lower back knee toward floor. Keep front knee over ankle. Alternate legs.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: Jump while spreading legs and raising arms overhead, then return. Good for warm-up and cardio.

name: Burpees
description: Squat, kick feet back to plank, optional push-up, jump feet in, jump up. High-intensity full-body move.

name: Resistance Band Rows
description: Anchor band, pull hands to ribs squeezing shoulder blades. Control the return.

name: Band Squats
description: Stand on band, hold at shoulders. Squat down and up, keeping tension in the band.

name: Hip Hinge / Good Morning
description: Hinge at hips with soft knees, lower torso toward floor, drive through glutes to stand.

name: Calf Raises
description: Rise onto toes, pause at top, lower with control. Can be done bodyweight or with dumbbells.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Lie on back, feet flat. Drive through heels to lift hips, squeeze glutes at top.

name: Cat-Cow Stretch
description: On all fours, alternate rounding spine (cat) and arching (cow). Gentle mobility for spine.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Press dumbbells overhead from shoulder height. Keep core braced and avoid arching back.

name: Dead Bug
description: On back, extend opposite arm and leg while keeping lower back pressed to floor. Alternate sides.

name: Inchworms
description: From standing, walk hands out to plank, then walk feet to hands. Stretches hamstrings and shoulders.

name: Box Step-Ups
description: Step one foot onto a stable box, drive up to stand. Lower with control. Low impact.

name: Wall Sit
description: Back against wall, slide down until knees at 90 degrees. Hold for time. Knee-friendly.

name: Bird Dog
description: On all fours, extend opposite arm and leg. Hold briefly, switch. Good for balance and core.

name: High Knees
description: Run in place driving knees up. Good for cardio and warm-up. Can be low impact by marching.
